    • Field Detail

      • isEater

        boolean isEater
        If true, this piece is an eater and not a cake.

      • pieceColor

        int pieceColor
        Color of this piece. Currently allowed Color.BLUE, Color.GREEN, Color.WHITE, Color.RED and Color.YELLOW.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NormalBoardPiece

        NormalBoardPiece(int board_x,
                 int board_y,
                 int piece_color,
                 boolean is_eater)
        Constructor. Sets the graphics coordinates from the board coordinates.
        Parameters:
        board_x - Cell x coordinate.
        board_y - Cell y coordinate.
        piece_color - Piece's color (green, red, yellow, white or blue).
        is_eater - True if eater and false if cake.

    • Method Detail

      • eat

        public boolean eat(Board board,
                   int index)
        Checks for the pieces around and marks them to be eaten if that is the case. If this piece is set as toDelete == true and wasTested == false, then checks the pieces around and if they are of the same color, sets their toDelete = true, sets their eater = to the one of this piece, and sets wasTested = true. When index == 0, sets toDelete = true if it is an eater, and at index == 37, sets toDelete = false if it is an eater.
        Specified by:
        eat in class BoardPiece
        Parameters:
        board - GameBoard to have access to the other pieces.
        index - The stage of the eating process.
        Returns:
        True if some piece was eaten.

      • testAbove

        private boolean testAbove(Board board)
        When eating, tests the piece on top if it should be eaten.
        Parameters:
        board - The game board.
        Returns:
        True if there was a piece to eat.
